lines.text: He's going to the jungles of Africa, slippers won't save him.
Captain, I've been appointed as this boy's caretaker for the remainder of this journey.
Captain, my father arranged for a guide to meet us.
A guide huh? He'll probably eat you
Are you the captain of this here bucket?
This is the African Queen, not some bucket! It's a ship, and it's my ship, and you can go to hell!
